item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign's Collector Signboard is a Game Changer
item.description:
Despite the deck being stacked against it, Elden Ring Nightreign has managed to succeed as an Elden Ring spin-off, even if the games are as different as night and day. Unlike its open-world action-RPG parent, Elden Ring Nightreign is a co-op-oriented roguelike with battle royale elements, and many fans were unsure about it being a worthy successor. While the game is not for everyone, and only a fraction of Elden Ring ’s over-30 million players are interested in it, that fraction has still produced over 3.5 million sales in one week, so it's safe to say the experiment was a success.

After such an impressive start, the question then became what was next. Even if clearing its eight Nightlord runs and Remembrance quests wasn't easy, that's still a low amount of content for a roguelike to launch with. With Elden Ring Nightreign ’s paid DLC still under construction, FromSoftware has opted for a smaller set of updates in the meantime that add more replay value to the game. Nightreign is set to receive duos in the future, solo play has already been improved, and souped-up versions of the Nightlords are slowly rolling out, but it's the new vendor attached to those Nightlords that may be the most valuable addition.

How The Collector Signboard Fits Into Elden Ring Nightreign

Starting with Adel, Baron of the Night, Everdark Sovereign versions of every Nightlord will be added to Elden Ring Nightreign . The Everdark Sovereigns are stronger than their regular selves, only being open to players who have already cleared their old versions and demanding even more effort to overcome their new phases and abilities. Available Sovereigns will be up for one week before they rotate, but FromSoftware could take the Monster Hunter World approach and make them permanent additions once all the Sovereigns are released. It’s a good addition to Nightreign 's content, but will only really hook players seeking ever-greater challenges.

Things really start coming together once the merchant associated with these Everdark Sovereigns comes into play. After managing to defeat one of Nightreign 's Sovereigns, the player will receive a new currency called Sovereign Sigils and access to the Collector Signboard in the bottom-left exterior of the Roundtable Hold. From here, players can spend Sigils to:

  • Gain additional Vessels
  • Buy powerful Relics
  • Buy costumes
  • Swap between the two versions of the Guardian’s final Remembrance Relic
  • Trigger any Shifting Earth event
  • Unlock the ability to switch between the dark and light states of the Roundtable Hold’s Great Site of Grace

While most of the items on offer are shared between the Collector Signboard and the existing Murk shop, there's too much potential here to ignore.

Elden Ring Nightreign’s Future Could Be Dictated By The Collector Signboard

Besides the inherent usefulness of gaining full control over the Shifting Earth system, the Collector Signboard should eventually become the destination of all endgame Nightreign players. Over the course of the game’s life, FromSoftware can add new costumes, Relics, and potentially even more quality-of-life purchases to the Collector Signboard’s wares. Some things could also be part of the Murk economy, but at considerably higher prices than anything in Nightreign at this point. Everdark Sovereign clears and grinding would give postgame players something to do, and the Collector Signboard would provide that little bit of extra motivation.

FromSoftware Must Follow Through With The Collector Signboard

Of course, that makes a lot of presumptions about FromSoftware’s intentions with the Collector Signboard compared to how it’s implemented right now, but there are not many other ways to take a vendor with a superboss-fueled currency. This could, and should, change how players interact with Nightreign , and since the game’s campaign can potentially end very quickly, a transformative objective feels like the missing piece. Hopefully, whatever is planned for the Sovereign system and the Collector Signboard can keep Elden Ring Nightreign worth returning to for months to come.

8 Images
8 Images

Take command of uniquely skilled heroes, each possessing their own abilities and distinct flair.

While individually formidable, their skills create powerful synergies when they unite as a team.

Overcome a relentless environmental threat that sweeps through a land that changes between each game session and defeat the magnificent boss of that night!"

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 2.3 is a Mystery, But One Thing is Bound to Happen
item.description:
During an earnings call in May 2024, CD Projekt Red announced that it had officially ended all development on Cyberpunk 2077 . According to a chart provided by the company, none of the employees at CDPR were working on the game anymore, as most of them had moved on to other projects like The Witcher 4 and Project Orion, Cyberpunk 2077 's upcoming sequel. Many fans weren't surprised by this news at the time because, prior to this announcement, the last major update for Cyberpunk 2077 had been released nearly six months ago. Since CDPR had already added tons of new features to the game in the years since its debut, it made sense that the company would want to deprioritize support for the title.

Contrary to the statements it made, however, CD Projekt Red seemingly changed its mind and released yet another major update for Cyberpunk 2077 at the end of 2024, right in time for the game's fourth anniversary. This update, which was titled Patch 2.2, was developed in collaboration with support studio Virtuos, and it added a bunch of new cosmetic features to the game, like an improved photo mode and extra character customization options. As if the reveal of this update wasn't surprising enough, CD Projekt Red recently confirmed that a new patch for Cyberpunk 2077 is already in development, and it's scheduled to come out on June 26.

Patch 2.3 Will Likely Break Most of Cyberpunk 2077's Mods

CD Projekt Red Has Shared Very Little Information About Cyberpunk 2077's Next Update

To celebrate Cyberpunk 2077 's launch on Nintendo Switch 2, CD Projekt Red hosted a livestream on its official YouTube channel, and during this event, it announced the next update for the game, named Patch 2.3. Although CDPR didn't reveal any concrete information about the patch and what it would contain, the announcement sent the Cyberpunk community into a frenzy, with many expressing excitement over the potential features that could be added in the new update. The modding community of Cyberpunk 2077 , however, might not have been as enthused by the news.

Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition was released as a launch title for the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5. This is the first time that CD Projekt Red has ever released a game in conjunction with a console's debut.

Updates Often Cause Compatibility Issues With Script-Based Mods

If there's one thing that's bound to happen with major updates to video games, it's the disruption of mod support. Due to the way that they're designed, mods are typically only compatible with certain versions of games. Therefore, whenever a company updates a title, mod creators have to update their mods, as well. Cyberpunk 2077 's mods, unfortunately, suffer from the same problem. Every patch that CD Projekt Red has released has messed with Cyberpunk 2077 mods in one way or another. Fans have sometimes had to resort to using old versions of Cyberpunk 2077 in order to install the mods that they want.

Cyberpunk 2077 's updates do not always break every mod, however. The impact that a patch has on the mods for a game depends on the new features that said patch implements. A patch that introduces new cosmetics, for instance, often breaks cosmetic-related mods for Cyberpunk 2077 . Script-based mods tend to be the most prone to failure, since they directly change the code of the game. Meanwhile, texture packs and mods that only add new models aren't broken by updates as easily.

CDPR Should Release an Official Mod Toolkit for Cyberpunk 2077

As great as it is that CD Projekt Red is still supporting Cyberpunk 2077 , mod creators probably aren't going to be happy about needing to update most of their mods after Patch 2.3 comes out. Although this won't completely fix the problem at hand, it would be nice if CD Projekt Red made it easier for modders to create and update their mods by releasing a mod toolkit for the game. Considering that CD Projekt Red recently added official mod support to The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt on PC, this isn’t outside the realm of possibility.

Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action-adventure from the creators of The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, CD Projekt Red.

Set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification, you play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.

Upgraded with next-gen in mind and featuring free additional content, customize your character and playstyle as you take on jobs, build a reputation, and unlock upgrades.

The relationships you forge and the choices you make will shape the story and the world around you. Legends are made here. What will yours be?

item.title: Roblox: Grow a Garden Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
If you've ever thought about starting your own garden, then Grow a Garden is just what you need. This farming simulator offers you a great plot of fertile soil where you can grow anything, provided you have the seeds. And to get them faster, you can use Grow a Garden codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they grant players various free goodies from the developers. Just a few of them will be enough to speed up your progress, even if you've just started harvesting your first crop in your garden.

Updated June 22, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Grow a Garden has only one active code available right now. It gives you an Exotic Bug Egg and a few Basic Seedpacks. Check back later to see if more rewards get added.

All Grow a Garden Codes

Working Grow a Garden Codes

  • LUNARGLOW10 : Enter this code to get 1 Exotic Bug Egg and 3 Basic Seedpacks. (NEW)

Expired Grow a Garden Codes

  • There are no expired codes in Grow a Garden .

When you first join Grow a Garden , you will find yourself in front of a small garden with several soil plots. Your inventory will only contain a shovel and 20 cash. So first, players must visit the Shop and purchase carrot seeds to plant and later sell them. The more different crops and plants you can grow, the more you will earn. But it is worth noting that the prices for seeds vary quite a lot, so Grow a Garden codes can help you.

Each such code can contain useful rewards. If you are lucky, you can even get cash or unique and expensive seeds. However, almost all Roblox codes are valid for a very limited time. So we recommend that you use them as soon as possible to not miss out on free goodies.

How to Redeem Grow a Garden Codes

Recently, the developers of Grow a Garden added code redemption to the game. Although this process is not very different from other Roblox games, we have prepared a detailed guide for you in case you have any troubles:

  • Open Roblox and launch Grow a Garden .
  • In the upper left corner, click on the gear icon to open the settings.
  • Scroll down this menu until you see Redeem Codes.
  • Paste or type the code in the appropriate field and click Claim.
  • If successfully redeemed, you will automatically receive the reward in your inventory.

How to Get More Grow a Garden Codes

Most Roblox developers post new codes on their official social media pages. So we recommend that you visit the Grow a Garden developer pages to stay up to date with all the news, including upcoming updates, maintenance, and of course, the latest codes:

  • Official The Garden Game Roblox group
  • Official Grow a Garden Discord server

item.title: Roblox: Project Blue Lock Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Project Blue Lock Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Project Blue Lock
  • How to Get More Project Blue Lock Codes

Project Blue Lock is an addictive soccer simulator where you can train and play against others to prove your skills. This Roblox experience offers intense and action-packed matches, for which you need to be prepared not only by playing well, but also by compiling a good build from the various abilities you have acquired.

Redeeming Project Blue Lock codes will give you a great opportunity to roll for new abilities, as it will reward you with a bunch of Spins. So, if you have just started playing or are not satisfied with your build, codes are exactly what you need.

Updated June 22, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh batch of codes has just arrived, offering free Spins to help you get ahead in Project Blue Lock . Each new code grants you extra chances to train and score, giving you a boost in your gameplay. These rewards can help you progress smoothly and experiment with new strategies. More codes may be on the way, so be sure to check back regularly for updates.

All Project Blue Lock Codes

Working Project Blue Lock Codes

  • REOUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)
  • CHAMELEON - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)
  • DEFENSEKING2 - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)
  • 1KFOLLOWERS - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)

Expired Project Blue Lock Codes

  • NIKOUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • FOOTBALLSENSOR - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • DEFENSEKING - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • TWITTERANALYST - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • TWITTERKING? - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • KINGUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • THEKINGISHERE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • BAROU - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • LAVINHOUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • THEDANCER - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • WORLDCLASS - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • BRAZIL - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • PITY - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • LASTLUCK - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • DEMONKING - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • PUZZLE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • FERNYPLS - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • NELISAGI - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • OREWAEGOIST - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • URWELCOME - Redeem this code to get 30 Spins.
  • LUCKYRIN - Redeem this code to get 3 Lucky Spins.
  • MELRIN - Redeem this code to get 20 Spins.
  • EGOISTA - Redeem this code to get 10 Spins.
  • QUARESMA - Redeem this code to get 2 Lucky Spins.
  • 3MVISITS - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • 3MHURRAY - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • THANKSFOR15K - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • ACE-EATER - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • DONLORENZO - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • FREECODE?? - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Since powerful abilities are rare, you'll need a lot of Spins, which are not easy to get. Redeeming codes is one of the best sources of Spins farming, so don't neglect it and take advantage of them while they are active.

How to Redeem Codes for Project Blue Lock

It won't take you long to redeem codes in Project Blue Lock , especially if you've done it before in other Roblox experiences. To simplify the task even further, use our guide to find out how to redeem rewards:

  • Launch Project Blue Lock .
  • Pay attention to the bottom of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a row. Among them, interact with the last one, which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a blue Redeem button below it. Now, copy and paste one of the working codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the blue Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a “Success” notification in the lower right part of the screen, and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Project Blue Lock Codes

You can find all the necessary information about updates, announcements, and Roblox codes on the game's official social media pages. So, not to miss out on freebies, visit these resources and carefully monitor them for new codes:

  • Official Project Blue Lock Roblox group.
  • Official Project Blue Lock Discord server.

item.title: Fans of Stardew Valley's Penny Will Adore This Palia Character
item.description:
Among Stardew Valley ’ s many beloved characters, Penny stands apart as one of the game’s most tender-hearted and quietly compelling romance options. Soft-spoken and gentle, she spends her days tutoring the town’s children and dreaming of a better life, far from the cluttered trailer she shares with her mother, who struggles with a drinking problem. Her path is one of patience, education, and hope: a kind of gentle resistance against her circumstances. It’s no wonder she captured the hearts of so many Stardew Valley players, regardless of whether they romanced her or just remained her friend.

With Palia entering the life sim space as one of 2025’s coziest games for Stardew Valley fans, players are once again exploring the landscape of slow-burn connections, charismatic friendships, and meaningful relationships. And while the world of Palia is much more whimsical than the rural simplicity of Pelican Town, one character in particular feels like a spiritual match for fans who fell in love with Penny’s kindness and quiet ambition: a curious researcher with an eye on the past and a heart that’s wide open to wonder.

Stardew Valley’s Penny and Palia’s Jina: Bookish, Thoughtful, and Driven by Curiosity

Like Penny, Jina’s life is defined by her thirst for knowledge. She can often be found exploring ruins and cataloging artifacts alongside her companion, Hekela, as they piece together the forgotten human history of the world they inhabit. Where Penny devotes herself to education in the form of teaching, Jina leans toward discovery, but both characters center their lives on the pursuit of intellectual understanding. That shared love of learning makes Jina a perfect fit for anyone who once followed Penny around Pelican Town with library books in hand. But instead of books, Jina might send a player on quests.

Jina also shares Penny’s introspective energy. She’s not the loudest voice in the room despite her enthusiasm, but that’s exactly what makes her shine. Her dialogue is thoughtful and sincere, often carrying a sweet and genuine awe for the world around her. She finds meaning in the small things, whether it’s an artifact uncovered in the dirt or a particularly well-worded theory. And for players looking for depth over drama, Jina’s subtle grace makes a strong impression.

A Soft Heart in a Fantastical or Tough World

Penny’s story in Stardew Valley is partially rooted in her desire for escape. Penny is in a problematic home life that Stardew Valley players can’t help, and she dreams of a more peaceful home of her own. Though her circumstances are far from ideal, she never loses her sense of kindness. Jina, while not weighed down by the same personal struggles, still carries a sense of yearning that fans of Penny will recognize. She’s chasing answers, trying to connect the pieces of a world that has lost so much. That sense of quiet yearning makes her feel instantly familiar.

And despite Palia ’s evolving fantastical setting—filled with magical creatures, ancient ruins, and glowing plants—Jina’s emotional tone stays grounded. She’s not a grand adventurer or boisterous warrior; she’s an ordinary person with an extraordinary sense of curiosity. It’s easy to imagine Penny stepping into her shoes, trading the library for ancient ruins and still finding peace among forgotten books and untold stories.

The Romances that Feel Earned in Palia and Stardew Valley

One of Penny’s defining traits was her gentle patience. Building a relationship with her required a slow and steady approach—getting to know Penny’s favorite gifts, understanding her hopes, and treating her with the consistent kindness she shows others. Jina follows a similar path. She doesn’t fall quickly or easily, but over time, she reveals a sweet vulnerability and warmth that makes the romance feel genuine and well-earned. In a genre that often rewards immediate gratification, both Jina and Penny stand out as characters who ask for time. They’re not aloof or difficult, but they do require players to be present, thoughtful, and intentional. That emotional pacing lends weight to their romance arcs, transforming them from checklist tasks into actual relationships that evolve alongside the game.

A Gentle Spirit in a Cozy World

What makes Jina such a standout in Palia is her ability to bring a player into the world as soon as the tutorial. And once that tutorial is over, she remains a recognizable friend to return to. While other romanceable characters in Palia might skew quirky, flirty, or aloof, Jina offers players something grounded, a kind of emotional equilibrium. She’s soft-spoken without being passive, intelligent without being condescending, and curious without being reckless. And for players who once chose Penny for her compassion, simplicity, and hopefulness, Jina offers that same steady calm.

A Love Letter to the Quiet, Unseen Ones

It’s easy to gravitate toward the loudest characters in games that offer romance options—the rebels, the charmers, the comedic relief. But characters like Penny and Jina prove that the quiet characters often leave the deepest impression. Their impact comes not from dramatic declarations or flashy entrances, but from the small, consistent ways they show care, listen deeply, and remain true to themselves. Jina may not come from a broken home like Penny, but she shares her spirit. She represents the beauty of quiet resilience, the power of knowledge, and the comfort of a romance built on mutual understanding. For fans of Stardew Valley ’s bookish sweetheart, Jina is a romance option worth every minute spent getting to know her.

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

You’ve inherited your grandfather’s old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home? It won’t be easy. Ever since Joja Corporation came to town, the old ways of life have all but disappeared. The community center, once the town’s most vibrant hub of activity, now lies in shambles. But the valley seems full of opportunity. With a little dedication, you might just be the one to restore Stardew Valley to greatness!
